title: New: Beat Culture – Useless
content: Following on from the phenomenal success of his attempt at remixing The XX, bedroom producer Beat Culture has dropped a new cut in the form of the glittering Useless. Despite his career still being very much in it’s infancy, there’s a real sense of development and learning experienced on each and every new track that Kim releases. Whether it’s learning new techniques, finding slicker samples or adding the final finishing touches to his work, Beat Culture is maturing far faster than anyone could have predicted.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
